authors.author: G R A H A M K E N D R I C K

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord is present here x 3
Come worship
The Lord is present here x 3
Come worship
Brought near by Jesus' blood x 3
We worship
With angels round your throne x 3
We worship

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We offer up our lives
A living sacrifice
Pouring out our gifts
Of thanks and praise
This is your holy hill
You call us higher still
Joining with all heaven
To acclaim

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Holy Holy Holy Lord
God of power and might
Heaven and earth are full
Of your glory

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Let all the nations come x 3
And worship
Let all creation bow x 3
In worship
